content-model-tei:
{{optional}}
The name for the TEI content model, used when describing what type of content a page contains.
tei-libxml-empty-document: Error message raised when XML document or page is empty.
tei-libxml-error-message: Formats an XML parsing error from libxml. $1 is the error message in English and $2 is the line number. The error message is in English, use to wrap it.
tei-remex-error-message: Formats an HTML parsing error from RemexHTML. $1 is the error message in English and $2 is the character position of the error. The error message is in English, use to wrap it.
tei-validation-element-content-unexpecte: Error message when a TEI tag has an unexpected child. $1 is the unknown child tag name, $2 is the parent tag name and $3 is the line number.
Error message when a TEI tag contains text even if it should not. $1 is the parent tag name and $2 is the line number
tei-validation-element-content-too-short: Error message when a required child is missing. $1 is the list of names possible missing children, $2 is the parent tag name and $3 is the line number
tei-validation-no-root: Error message when the TEI XML content has no root tag.
tei-validation-unexpected-root: Error message when the root of the TEI XML content is not supported. $1 is the found root tag name.
tei-validation-wrong-namespace: Error message when an XML tag is in the wrong namespace. $1 is the found namespace and $2 the line number.
tei-validation-unknown-tag: Error message when an XML tag is not supported. $1 is the not supported tag name and $2 the line number.
tei-validation-unknown-attribute: Error message when an XML attribute is not supported. $1 is the not supported attribute name, $2 the name of the tag on which it is and $3 the line number.
tei-validation-missing-mandatory-attribu: Error message when a mandatory XML attribute is missing. $1 is the missing attribute name, $2 the name of the tag on which it is missing and $3 the line number.
tei-validation-count-invalid-value: Error when an attribute value is invalid. $1 is the wrong attribute value and $2 is the attribute name.
tei-validation-enumeration-unknown-value: Error when an attribute value is not in an expected enumeration. $1 is the wrong attribute value, $2 is the attribute name and $3 is the list of possible attribute values.
tei-validation-language-invalid-value: Error when an attribute value is invalid. $1 is the wrong attribute value and $2 is the attribute name.
tei-validation-numeric-invalid-value: Error when an attribute value is invalid. $1 is the wrong attribute value and $2 is the attribute name.
tei-validation-output-measurement-invali: Error when an attribute value is invalid. $1 is the wrong attribute value and $2 is the attribute name.
tei-validation-pointer-invalid-value: Error when an attribute value is invalid. $1 is the wrong attribute value and $2 is the attribute name.
tei-validation-temporal-w3c-invalid-valu: Error when an attribute value is invalid. $1 is the wrong attribute value and $2 is the attribute name.
tei-validation-truth-value-invalid-value: Error when an attribute value is invalid. $1 is the wrong attribute value and $2 is the attribute name.
tei-validation-word-invalid-value: Error when an attribute value is invalid. $1 is the wrong attribute value and $2 is the attribute name.
tei-validation-multiple-too-few-values: Error when an attribute value contains not enough parts. $1 is the wrong attribute value, $2 is the attribute name, $3 is the expected number of values and $4 the actual number.
tei-validation-multiple-too-many-values: Error when an attribute value contains too many parts. $1 is the wrong attribute value, $2 is the attribute name, $3 is the expected number of values and $4 the actual number.
tei-parser-file-not-found: Error returned when an included file does not exist with $1 the file name without namespace.
